info.name: Create Base Account
info.description:
Creates a base account fixture with a set of configurations that stands as the basis for automated QA test scenarios.

- This set of tests expects you to use the [Create Base Account](https://drive.google.com/open?id=1EXbdwP5IWnOir0zt_kBPZuvEqMyq4Uqr) data collection in the runner.

exec: tests["Account trusted live token: " + data.token] = true;

body.raw:
{
  "company_name": "My Company, Inc",
  "name": "John Clements",
  "email": "{{email}}",
  "website": "http://www.example.com",
  "phone": "888-282-2558",
  "address_1": "7119 W. Main St.",
  "address_2": "Suite 100",
  "city": "Los Angeles",
  "state_prov": "CA",
  "postal_code": "90071",
  "country": "US",
  "user_id": "jclements",
  "password": "myp@ssw0rd"
}

exec: tests["Account secret test token: " + data.token] = true;

item.name: Create Digital Product w/ Volume Prices

request.description:
- This set of tests expects you to use the [Customer Data Subscriptions](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/14wnj6iScmBw6jANOGR4Ki71uVzn5dZgE0KFAGEbz6LI/edit#gid=0) data collection in the runner.
- This set of tests expects you to be using the Base Account.

item.name: Create 5 Minute Subscription Plan w/ Trial

request.description:
- This set of tests expects you to use the [Customer Data Subscriptions](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/14wnj6iScmBw6jANOGR4Ki71uVzn5dZgE0KFAGEbz6LI/edit#gid=0) data collection in the runner.
- This set of tests expects you to be using the Base Account.

body.raw:
{
    "payment_method_type": "paypal",
    "provider_id": "paypal",
    "currencies": [
        "USD",
        "EUR",
        "GBP"
    ],
    "active": true,
    "comments": "PayPal Sandbox Account for QA testing",
    "fields": {
        "username": "{{pp_username}}",
        "client_id": "{{pp_client_id}}",
        "client_secret": "{{pp_client_secret}}",
        "username_nvp": "{{pp_username_nvp}}",
        "password_nvp": "{{pp_password_nvp}}",
        "signature_nvp": "{{pp_signature_nvp}}"
    }
}

{
	"payment_method_type": "credit_card",
    "provider_id": "braintree",
    "currencies": [
        "USD",
        "CAD",
        "EUR",
        "GBP"
    ],
    "card_types": [
        "Visa",
        "MasterCard",
        "Discover",
        "Diners Club",
        "American Express"
    ],
        "fields": {
        "merchant_id": "{{bt_merchant_ID}}",
        "public_key": "{{bt_public_key}}",
        "private_key": "{{bt_private_key}}"
    },
    "active": false,
    "weight": 0,
    "comments": "Braintree Sandbox Account for QA testing. Not active and weight of 0 on creation. Also needs currencies created on the sandbox side."
}
